data.title: Obituary for Jan M. Bissing
data.meta_description: Jan M. Bissing-Waters, age 56, passed away Monday, December 6, 2010 at Froedtert Hospital in Milwaukee. data.text:
Jan M. Bissing-Waters, age 56, passed away Monday, December 6, 2010 at Froedtert Hospital in Milwaukee. She was born on July 20, 1954 in Appleton; daughter of Raymond and Delores (Geurts) Bissing. On February 23, 1980, she was married to Mike Waters in Appleton. Jan graduated in 1975 from the Mercy School of Nursing in Oshkosh; received her B.S.N. from the University of Phoenix and worked for 35 years as an R.N. She enjoyed gardening, puzzling, board games, fishing, spending time with family on the lake and attending her sons sporting events. Many friendships were made with all of the sports families, Red Hat group, high school friends and past/present co-workers. Jan touched many lives as wife, mother, daughter, sister, friend, and co-worker. She truly was the definition of family. She exemplified love through her kind, caring, and unselfish heart. Jan will be greatly missed by family and friends. She is survived by her husband, Mike Waters, Appleton; her children, Drew Hamilton Drewbies, Grant Michael Granters and Ross Taylor Rossman, Appleton; mother, Delores (Geurts) Bissing, Appleton; father-in-law, Kenneth McAlexander, Atlanta, TX; siblings, Gene (Carol) Bissing, Appleton, Joe (Peggy) Bissing, Appleton, Mary Bissing-Olson (Brian Olson), Appleton, Joan Waldusky, Neenah, Dick (Rachelle) Bissing, Howard, WI, and Jackie (Nick) Thuren, Appleton; siblings-in-law, Randy (MaryJo) McAlexander, Colorado Springs, CO, Richard McAlexander, Texarkana, AR and Joel McAlexander, Atlanta, TX; godmother, Lois Bissing, Black Creek, WI; nephews and nieces, Jeff (Tressa Pappas) Bissing, Madison, Jill (Chris) Swenson, their children, Elsa and Ben, Forest Lake, MN, Jesse (Becky) Bissing, their children, Briley, Jase, and Hudson, Milwaukee, Danny Bissing, Milwaukee, Lexy Bissing, Milwaukee, Megan Bissing-Olson (Hannes Zacher), Brisbane, Australia, Casey Bissing-Olson, Milwaukee, Emily Bissing-Olson, Appleton, Lindsey Bissing, Minneapolis, MN, Sam Bissing, Howard, WI, Tali Bissing, Howard, WI, Mason McAlexander, Colorado Springs, CO and Shawn McAlexander, Texarkana, AR. She was preceded in death by her father, Raymond Bissing, mother-in-law, Kathryn (Burkhalter) McAlexander and Godfather, Leo Bissing. A memorial service for Jan will be held on Saturday, December 11, 2010 at 4:00 p.m. at Valley Funeral Home, Appleton with Michael Bergen officiating. Family and friends may visit at the funeral home on Saturday from 1:00 p.m. until the time of service. A memorial fund is being established in her name.

A sincere thank you to the MICU and Palliative Care units at Froedtert Lutheran Memorial Hospital, Milwaukee for the wonderful comfort and care that they provided to both Jan and the family. We appreciate all that you have done.

Valley Funeral Home

2211 N. Richmond St.

920-733-5435

*Serving as would be Served*
